channel.title: Social Media on Polis Paralela
channel.description: Recent content in Social Media on Polis Paralela

item.title: Helping Cade Street Nursery to Grow
item.description: What we did • Digital Marketing • Social Media • Paid Social The brief Cade Street Nursery is a family business based in Heathfield, East Sussex, and they have been growing plants and flowers there since the 1980s. “Polis Paralela responded to the challenge of the targets set within the project and really got behind our business. Targets were exceeded and this resulted in a good uplift in sales.” — Rob Honeysett, Cade Street Nursery Sales & Planning Manager Polis Paralela had previously developed a website for them in 2014.
